title: In Step Out of Step II
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and C See Inscription
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has rust, orange and yellow cloudy ground with twisting background shapes, linear grey coil and turquoise linear coil on top; bottom sheet has blue ground with fuzzy gold interior area; looping linear shapes in orange and pale yellow
creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
